name: KingOfPop
author: tom

sections.description: Displays a Micheal Jackson memorial badge in the sidebar of your blog via widget interface or anywhere else via function call. Make the people remember the King of Pop.
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the zipfile kingofpop-X.y.zip
  2. Upload folder kingofpop to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. configure the color etc. via ‘admin interface’
  5. Place <?php if(function_exists('kingofpop_display')) kingofpop_display(); ?> in your template or use the sidebar widgets.
sections.changelog:
• v0.3 2014-10-15 updated to wp 4x
  • v0.2 2009-06-27 small css fix makes micheal looks better
  • v0.1 2009-06-26 initial release
